title: Ashampoo Burning Studio 2017
text:

Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $23.99 Giveaway of the day — Ashampoo Burning Studio 2017 Burn CDs, DVDs and Blu-ray discs fast and safely! User rating: 4 (80%) 1 (20%) Leave a comment 
Ashampoo Burning Studio 2017 is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now Ashampoo Burning Studio 2017 Terms and conditions 
Ashampoo Burning Studio 2017 is a powerful burning application that covers various use cases. It burns files, music or movies and extracts audio from CDs, but also provides backup functionality also for external devices such as flash drives, cellphones or tablets. The integrated cover editor helps with designing individual covers and booklets and comes with multiple ready to use templates for quick results. Copying existing discs is effortless, this includes the creation, browsing and burning of disc images. 
Please note: You can upgrade to Ashampoo Burning Studio 18 from this version. A unique upgrade price for GOTD users: $23.99 instead of $59.99.   7/ 8/ 8.1/ 10; Single-core 1 GHz processor; Memory: 2 GB or more; Hard Disk Space: 250 MB for installation; Windows Media Player 10 (Or higher); Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5; DirectX 9.0C Publisher:
